name: Occult dungeons
description:
The lone knight found himself locked in the dungeons of the occultists. Ahead of him are many monsters, dangers and mysteries. To gain freedom, he will have to tarnish his honor and engage in occult rituals with sacriface.

Control: left mouse button - to do everything.

Web version may take a some minutes to download. You can download standalone version if you don't want to wait it.

Game was made for Untitled Game Jam #33.
Theme: ( Evolution and Sacrifice (You can either choose one of the themes or do both))

Thanks for assets to:
https://assetstore.unity.com/
https://freesound.org/
https://tabletopaudio.com/
